Sentencas: Perovskite-type oxides have consistently attracted considerable attention for their applications in high-temperature electrochemical devices, such as electrolytes and electrodes of solid oxide fuel cells, oxygen permeating membranes and sensors etc.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: Among them, the electrical conductivity of 10 % Sr and 10 % Mg doped LaAlO3 (LSAM9191) was measured using impedance spectroscopy and 4-probe d.c. method.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: Below 550 degrees C, the grain boundary resistance mostly determined the overall conductivity; however, it nearly disappeared above 800 degrees C.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: Using the defect model and curve fitting, the ionic and electronic conductivity contributions were also separated.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: In the temperature region where the sample resistance is mostly determined by the grain volume property, LSAM9191 was an oxygen ion conductor at low Po-2 and a mixed conductor at high Po-2.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: With increasing temperature, the ionic conduction region only slightly increased.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3

Sentencas: Thus, LSAM9191 is a promising material as an oxygen ion conductor at high temperature and in low Po-2.
Titulo: High temperature electrical properties of Sr- and Mg-Doped LaAlO3
